abstract: The governor of Mississippi is expected to announce that his state will be the site of Toyota’s eighth assembly plant in the United States.
snippet: The governor of Mississippi is expected to announce that his state will be the site of Toyota’s eighth assembly plant in the United States.
lead_paragraph: The governor of Mississippi is expected to announce this morning that his state will be the site of Toyota’s eighth assembly plant in North America.

headline.main: Mississippi Expects to Be Site of a Toyota Assembly Plant
headline.print_headline: Mississippi Expects to Be Site Of a Toyota Assembly Plant
